text: Thesmophora is a genus of flowering plants in the family Stilbaceae described as a genus in 1993. There is only one known species, Thesmophora scopulosa, native to the Cape Province region in South Africa.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ==References== == See also == *John Patrick Rourke Category:Monotypic Lamiales genera Category:Stilbaceae Category:Endemic flora of South Africa
title: Thesmophora
